Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item carries a significant value to me, but I'm confident it holds even greater potential for you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer of $200 for you to experience its excellence. I believe this price reflects its true worth and provides you with an opportunity to enjoy its features at a special rate. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
